messages.content: The truth is, governing with the Conservatives hasn't always been easy.
The Conservatives will cut deeper and faster with the burden falling on those least able to cope.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: The Liberal Democrats plan to balance the budget by 2018 while protecting the vital services we all rely on.
The party is committed to increasing NHS spending by £8 billion a year and protecting education from cradle to college.

mentions.tacticalSituation: How you voted last time - showing historic voting patterns and suggesting voting consideration for 'Gerald Vernon-Jackson' based on the previous election result

issues.economy: The deficit has been halved and more people are in work than ever before. Let's not be fooled into thinking that the recovery job has been finished.
issues.health: Committed to increasing NHS spending by £8 billion a year.

leaflet.personalStatement: You can’t trust the Conservative candidate to stand up for Portsmouth.

politicalExperience.achievements: Kicked off the Council in Winchester after moving to America.

images.caption: Picture of Gerald Vernon-Jackson next to text.

leaflet.additionalNotes: PS. You can't trust the Conservative candidate to stand up for Portsmouth. She was kicked off the Council in Winchester after moving to America. Only Gerald Vernon-Jackson and the Liberal Democrats will balance the books in a way that is fair for everyone.
